text: Budapest Honvéd Football Club () is a Hungarian sports club based in Kispest, Budapest with the colours of red and black. The club is best known for its football team. It was originally formed as Kispest AC. They became Kispest FC in 1926 before reverting to their original name in 1944. ==References== Category:20th-century establishments in Hungary Category:1909 establishments in Europe Category:Hungarian football clubs Category:Sport in Budapest Category:Organizations based in Budapest
title: Budapest Honvéd FC
